title: kUvuginrEn unai
sahitya:
kUvuginrEn unai nAn kOkilapriyA konjik-konjik-konjit-tanjam tanjam enrE


anupallavi

  dEvA dEvAdi dEvA vA vA enakkirangi sAvaiyum taDuttiDum samaya sanjIviyE


caraNam    mudiya mugguNa donda mUTTai sumandukoNDE mOhak-kAnalil inip-pOgha muDiyAdappA
pudiya vasanta mukhap-punnakai kATTi jnAna bOdham vaLarattar-bOdham taLara vENDik-
